meanings.definition: The act of marking with a branding iron.
meanings.sent1: The rancher applied brandings to his cattle to show ownership.
meanings.sent2: The brandings on the horses indicated they belonged to the rodeo company.
meanings.sent3: The brandings on the sheep made them look like they were wearing designer labels.
meanings.sent4: The brandings on the wooden crates symbolized quality and authenticity.
meanings.sent5: The brandings on the leather products were intricate and eye-catching.

meanings.sent1: The brandings on the cow's hide were clear and distinct.
meanings.sent2: The brandings left a permanent mark on the livestock.
meanings.sent3: The brandings on the fence resembled a secret code to the animals.
meanings.sent4: The brandings on the packaging ensured it was genuine.
meanings.sent5: The brandings on the map indicated the locations of different ranches.

meanings.definition: The process of establishing a brand or identity for a product or company.
meanings.sent1: The brandings of the company logo were seen on all their products.
meanings.sent2: The brandings of the company's values were evident in their marketing campaigns.
meanings.sent3: The brandings of the new brand were met with excitement by customers.
meanings.sent4: The brandings of the company's image were carefully crafted by the marketing team.
meanings.sent5: The brandings of the product packaging reflected the company's commitment to quality.
